#X.W. Xia et al. / Atomic Data and Nuclear Data Tables 121–122 (2018) 1–215
Table 1

Ground-state properties of nuclei calculated by RCHB theory with PC-PK1, in comparison with the 
available data of masses and charge radii. In addition, the data labeled with underline means the 
nucleus is unbound.
